about_the_game:
Chromesthesia VR: The Ultimate Music Visualizer

Immerse Yourself in the Spectacle of Sound
Step into the mesmerizing world of Chromesthesia VR, where your favorite music becomes a vibrant visual masterpiece. With over 45 stunning effects and compatibility with nearly any audio source—MP3s, YouTube, Spotify, Pandora, or your personal playlists—Chromesthesia transforms sound into a symphony of dazzling lights and colors.

Key Features:
🎶 Dynamic Visuals: Choose from 47 customizable effects that react in real-time to your music, with adjustable parameters to make every session unique.
🎵 Built-in Music Library: Enjoy curated tracks spanning genres like synthwave, cyberpunk, metal, and lo-fi.
🕹️ Intuitive Controls: Seamlessly switch effects, tweak settings, and customize visuals with improved user controls.
🎧 Broad Compatibility: Optimized for OpenXR, Chromesthesia supports headsets like the HTC Vive, Valve Index, Oculus Rift, and Oculus Quest (via PC link).
🌟 Future-Ready: Stay tuned for exciting updates, including new effects, game modes, and potentially multiplayer environments.

Discover Chromesthesia VR 2.0
With enhanced reactivity, smoother transitions, and immersive audio synchronization, Chromesthesia VR 2.0 builds on its acclaimed predecessor with an even deeper connection to the music you love. Whether you’re dancing, meditating, or simply unwinding, Chromesthesia VR turns your music into a transformative experience.

WARNING: Contains intense flashing lights. Not recommended for those prone to seizures.

About the Developer

Created by indie developer Kenneth Rougeau of Goodfoot Games, Chromesthesia VR is a passion project crafted for music lovers, artists, and visionaries. This app is the culmination of years of feedback, innovation, and love for the immersive power of music and light.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR-compatible VR headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 6600 XT equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR-compatible VR headset

short_description: Transform your music into a vibrant spectacle with Chromesthesia VR! Dive into 47 real-time reactive effects, compatible with nearly any audio source. Designed for VR headsets, Chromesthesia brings your favorite tracks to life in stunning visual harmony. Dance, relax, and immerse yourself in sound.
